title: ninana velasina
sahitya:
ninnana valasina dEmi nannana valenu gAka



anupallavi



 kanna taNDri nIkanna vElpu runnArurA Apanna rakSaka nE



caraNam 1



 kana saurincani durjanula bhASaNa lEka manasuna nenaruna nInu jUcinAnA 

anudinamunanu nE ninugana sajjana sEva vinayamunanu nijamuga jEsinAnA

   

caraNam 2



 vinavayya manavini sanakAdi vinuta nE dhanamunu konina bhAmanu prEmamIra 

enayaka manasanu vanajamuna nati vEgana padamuna pUja nonarincinAnA

   

caraNam 3



 kalimAnavulu sEyu cAla kAryamulanu nE nilalOnu teliyaka valaciti gAni 

kalalOnu galigina kalumula valE nEnci valacaka balu tapamulu jEsinAnA

   

caraNam 4



 k\jalajApta kula vara tilaka vInula nI kathalu vinna balu pApamulu bOnugAni 

kulumula pAlukula celulu vashyulu gAni toli janmamula pUjA phalamEmO teliya

   

caraNam 5



 shara cApadhara yOgi varanuta paripUrNa nararUpa niratamu vara tyAgarAja 

paripAla surabhUmi surulanu sthiramuga karuNincu birudu nI karamuna meraya
